Name: Absorb
Effect: Use recovers 50% of the HP drained from the opponent.

Name: Barrage
Effect: Hits 2-5 times in one turn. Multi-hitting.

Name: Bide
Effect: User takes damage for two turns then strikes back double.

Name: Bind
Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Name: Clamp
Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 2-5 turns.

Name: Comet Punch
Effect: Hits 2-5 times in one turn. Multi-hitting.

Name: Conversion
Effect: Changes user's type to that of its opponent.

Name: Counter
Effect: When hit by a Normal or Fighting type Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

Name: Dig
Effect: Digs underground on first turn, attacks on second. Can also escape from caves.

Name: Disable
Effect: Opponent can't use its last attack for a few turns.

Name: Double Slap
Effect: Hits 2-5 times in one turn. Multi-hitting.

Name: Dream Eater
Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on a sleeping opponent.

Name: Fire Spin
Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 2-5 turns.

Name: Fly
Effect: Flies up on first turn, attacks on second turn.

Name: Focus Energy
Effect: Decreases Crit Ratio. Never use this!!!

Name: Fury Attack
Effect: Hits 2-5 times in one turn. Multi-hitting.

Name: Fury Swipes
Effect: Hits 2-5 times in one turn. Multi-hitting.

Name: Growth
Effect: Raises user’s special by one stage.

Name: High Jump Kick
Effect: If it misses, the user loses 1 HP.

Name: Jump Kick
Effect: If it misses, the user loses 1 HP.

Name: Leech Life
Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Name: Leech Seed
Effect: Drains HP from opponent each turn.

Name: Light Screen
Effect: Halves damage from Special attacks for 5 turns.

Name: Lovely Kiss
Effect: 100% chance of putting opponent to sleep.

Name: Mega Drain
Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Name: Metronome
Effect: User performs almost any move in the game at random.

Name: Mirror Move
Effect: User performs the opponent's last move.

Name: Mist
Effect: User's stats cannot be changed for a period of time.

Name: Night Shade
Effect: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

Name: Pay Day
Effect: A small amount of money is gained after the battle resolves.

Name: Petal Dance
Effect: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

Name: Pin Missile
Effect: Hits 2-5 times in one turn. Multi-hitting.

Name: Razor Wind
Effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. High critical hit ratio.

Name: Recover
Effect: User recovers half its max HP.

Name: Reflect
Effect: Halves damage from Physical attacks for 5 turns.

Name: Rest
Effect: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed.

Name: Sand Attack
Effect: Decreases the opponent’s accuracy by one stage

Name: Seismic Toss
Effect: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

Name: Sing
Effect: 100% chance of putting opponent to sleep.

Name: Skull Bash
Effect: Raises Defense on first turn, attacks on second.

Name: Sky Attack
Effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

Name: Sleep Powder
Effect: 100% chance of putting opponent to sleep.

Name: Soft-Boiled
Effect: User recovers half its max HP.

Name: Solar Beam
Effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

Name: Spike Cannon
Effect: Hits 2-5 times in one turn. Multi-hitting.

Name: Spore
Effect: 100% chance of putting opponent to sleep.

Name: Substitute
Effect: Uses HP to creates a decoy that takes hits.

Name: Super Fang
Effect: Does damage equal to 50% of target’s HP.

Name: Thrash
Effect: User attacks for 3-4 turns but then becomes confused.

Name: Transform
Effect: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent.

Name: Twineedle
Effect: 20% chance of poisoning opponent. Hits twice.

Name: Wrap
Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 2-5 turns.
